question: What international status did Sibiu, Romania achieve in 2007?
true_answer: Sibiu became the European Capital of Culture along with Luxembourg.
asked_question_translated: Aký medzinárodný štatút získalo mesto Sibiu v Rumunsku v roku 2007?
answer: Mesto Sibiu v Rumunsku získalo v roku 2007 titul Európske hlavné mesto kultúry.
answer_translated_eng: Sibiu, Romania, was awarded the title of European Capital of Culture in 2007.
